analysis.description:
ServusToken.balances (/unique_chucks/24/0x27d4cb2f6be658a6223fce994d55093c4b7250ce.sol#143-144) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- balanceOfAt (/unique_chucks/24/0x27d4cb2f6be658a6223fce994d55093c4b7250ce.sol#231-256)
	- doTransfer (/unique_chucks/24/0x27d4cb2f6be658a6223fce994d55093c4b7250ce.sol#335-366)
	- mint (/unique_chucks/24/0x27d4cb2f6be658a6223fce994d55093c4b7250ce.sol#371-388)
	- importPresaleBalances (/unique_chucks/24/0x27d4cb2f6be658a6223fce994d55093c4b7250ce.sol#399-416)

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/24/0x27d4cb2f6be658a6223fce994d55093c4b7250ce.sol:
	Contract ServusToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/24/0x27d4cb2f6be658a6223fce994d55093c4b7250ce.sol#186-187)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

ServusToken.getValueAt.min (local variable @ /unique_chucks/24/0x27d4cb2f6be658a6223fce994d55093c4b7250ce.sol#470) shadows:
